properties.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 4:57AM MST until February 3 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph
expected. Winds becoming westerly by mid day.

* WHERE...Flagstaff, Doney Park, Leupp, Winona areas.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In
addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult,
especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of light snow showers is likely to
combine with these strong winds for a few hours this morning.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING EXPIRES AT 5 AM
